H0.text: What was Michael Jackson's signature dance move. Robot Dance

H1.text: What was Michael Jackson's signature dance move. Glide Step

H2.text: What was Michael Jackson's signature dance move. Spin Move

H3.text: What was Michael Jackson's signature dance move. Moonwalk

A4.text: Jackson has been credited as renaming the 'backslide' to the moonwalk and it became his signature move.

A5.text: Jackson's autobiography was titled Moonwalk, and he also starred in a 1988 film titled Moonwalker.
